summary.span: 包裝 ActiveX 控制項，並把這些控制項公開成為全功能的 Windows Form 控制項。

span.span: Wraps ActiveX controls and exposes them as fully featured Windows Forms controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會使用直接類別。You typically do not use the class directly. 您可以使用[Aximp.exe （Windows Form ActiveX 控制項匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md)產生擴充的包裝函式。You can use the [Aximp.exe (Windows Forms ActiveX Control Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md) to generate the wrappers that extend . ActiveX 控制項匯入工具會產生的類別，衍生自類別，並將它編譯成程式庫檔案 (DLL)，可新增為您的應用程式的參考。The ActiveX Control Importer generates a class that is derived from the class, and compiles it into a library file (DLL) that can be added as a reference to your application. 或者，您可以使用`/source`切換以 ActiveX 控制項匯入工具，並會產生的 C# 檔案您衍生的類別。Alternatively, you can use the `/source` switch with the ActiveX Control Importer and a C# file is generated for your derived class. 然後程式碼進行變更，並重新編譯為程式庫檔案。You can then make changes to the code and recompile it into a library file. > [!NOTE] > 如果 ActiveX 控制項的成員名稱符合.NET Framework 中定義的名稱，則 ActiveX 控制項匯入工具將成員名稱前面加上"Ctl"時，它會建立衍生的類別。If the name of a member of the ActiveX control matches a name defined in the .NET Framework, then the ActiveX Control Importer will prefix the member name with "Ctl" when it creates the derived class. 比方說，如果您的 ActiveX 控制項具有名為"Layout"的成員，它會重新命名為"CtlLayout"，在衍生類別，因為`Layout`在.NET Framework 中定義事件。For example, if your ActiveX control has a member named "Layout", it is renamed "CtlLayout" in the derived class because the `Layout` event is defined within the .NET Framework. 大部分的通用屬性的類別才有效，如果基礎 ActiveX 控制項公開這些屬性使用。Most of the common properties of the class are only valid and used if the underlying ActiveX control exposes those properties. 範例的通用屬性包括， ， ，和。A few examples of the common properties are , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用 Visual Studio 做為 Windows Form 設計環境，您可以對 ActiveX 控制項提供您的應用程式藉由將您的工具箱中的 ActiveX 控制項。If you are using Visual Studio as your Windows Forms design environment, you can make an ActiveX control available to your application by adding the ActiveX control to your Toolbox. 若要這麼做，請以滑鼠右鍵按一下**工具箱**，選取**自訂工具箱**，然後瀏覽至 ActiveX control's.ocx 檔案。To accomplish this, right-click the **Toolbox**, select **Customize Toolbox**, then browse to the ActiveX control's.ocx file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Visual Studio 文件中的 「 加入 ActiveX 控制項至 Windows Forms"。For more information, see "Adding ActiveX Controls to Windows Forms" in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會覆寫建構函式，而並方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 遮罩編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼需要您建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`切換到產生的包裝函式類別，以進行編輯。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此程式碼是只顯示在 C# 語法，因為這是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, wrapping the ActiveX control indicated by the specified CLSID, and using the shortcut-menu behavior indicated by the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的二進位表示法`flags`參數值包含的位元 0x1 的值來表示，將不會包含控制項的捷徑功能表**編輯**選項除非 ActiveX 控制項明確提供。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x1, the shortcut menu for the control will not contain an **Edit** option unless the ActiveX control explicitly provides it. 如果的二進位表示法`flags`參數值包含 0x2 的值來表示的位元，控制項的捷徑功能表會包含屬性選項，如果 ActiveX 控制項提供一組屬性頁中; 否則快顯功能表ActiveX 控制項明確提供時，才會包含屬性選項。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x2, the shortcut menu for the control will contain a Properties option if the ActiveX control offers a set of property pages; otherwise, the shortcut menu will contain a Properties option only if the ActiveX control explicitly provides it.

span.para: 擴充的類別應該覆寫這個方法。擴充的類別應該呼叫這個方法的覆寫的版本，內來擷取它自己的介面。在大部分情況下，方法應該不會呼叫這個方法之前呼叫。

Classes that extend should override this method. Within an overridden version of this method, the extending class should call to retrieve its own interface. In most cases, the method should not be called before this method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig float64 GetOADateFromTime(valuetype System.DateTime time) cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetOADateFromTime (time As DateTime) As Double

param.name: time
param.span: 要轉換的 結構。

span.span: The structure to translate.

summary.span: 傳回 OLE Automation 日期，對應至指定的 結構。

span.span: Returns an OLE Automation date that corresponds to the specified structure.

returns.span: 雙精確度浮點數，含有相當於指定之 值的 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE Automation 日期會實作為浮點數，其值是從午夜，30 年 12 月 1899年的天數。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose value is the number of days from midnight, 30 December 1899. 例如，日午夜 31 年 12 月 1899年表示 1.0;上午 6 點 2.25; 表示 1 年 1 月 1900午夜-1.0; 表示 29 的 12 月 1899而且早上 6 點-1.25 表示 29 的 12 月 1899年。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基底 OLE Automation 日期是午夜，30 年 12 月 1899年。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. 最大 OLE Automation 日期等同於、 31 年 12 月的最後一刻 9999。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 如需有關 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 這個執行個體的值無法表示為 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime GetTimeFromOADate(float64 date) cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetTimeFromOADate (date As Double) As DateTime

param.name: date
param.span: 要轉譯的 OLE Automate 日期。

span.span: The OLE Automate date to translate.

summary.span: 傳回 結構，對應至指定的 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: Returns a structure that corresponds to the specified OLE Automation date.

returns.span: ，表示和 相同的日期和時間。

span.span: A that represents the same date and time as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `date`參數是代表日期的日期之前或之後基底，午夜 30 年 12 月 1899年的天數為雙精確度浮點數。The `date` parameter is a double-precision floating-point number that represents a date as the number of days before or after the base date, midnight, 30 December 1899. 正負號和整數部分`date`編碼的日期為正數或負數天加上的位移，從 30 1899 年 12 月和值的小數部分的絕對值`date`會編碼為一天加上位移，從午夜一小部分的時間。The sign and integral part of `date` encode the date as a positive or negative day displacement from 30 December 1899, and the absolute value of the fractional part of `date` encodes the time of day as a fraction of a day displacement from midnight. `date` 必須是正數 2958466.0 透過負 657435.0 之間的值。`date` must be a value between negative 657435.0 through positive 2958466.0. 請注意，由於日期編碼的方式，有兩種表示任何時間的 30 年 12 月 1899年的日期。Note that because of the way dates are encoded, there are two ways of representing any time of day on 30 December 1899. 例如，-0.5，0.5 表示中午 30 年 12 月 1899年，因為一天加上位移的加號或減號基底零天仍然是基底的日期，而且從午夜的半天移動中午。For example, -0.5 and 0.5 both mean noon on 30 December 1899 because a day displacement of plus or minus zero days from the base date is still the base date, and a half day displacement from midnight is noon. 如需有關 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 日期不是有效的 OLE Automation 日期值。

span.span: The date is not a valid OLE Automation Date value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視窗訊息前置處理以判斷應該經過前置處理或直接傳送至 ActiveX 控制項指定的輸入的字元時呼叫方法。The method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the ActiveX control. 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否為另一個控制項的助憶鍵。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control. 中實作類別，方法一律會傳回`true`，因此指定的字元會直接傳送至 ActiveX 控制項。As implemented in the class, the method always returns `true`, so the specified character is sent directly to the ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法也可讓衍生的類別，來處理沒有附加委派方法。The method also allows derived classes to handle the method without attaching a delegate. 這是處理的慣用的技巧衍生類別中的方法。This is the preferred technique for handling the method in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會覆寫建構函式，而並方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 遮罩編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼需要您建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`切換到產生的包裝函式類別，以進行編輯。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此程式碼是只顯示在 C# 語法，因為這是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，好讓註冊的委派能接收方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`false`，會顯示任何屬性頁。If is `false`, no property pages are displayed. 屬性頁可讓使用者檢視和變更 ActiveX 控制項屬性的 ActiveX 控制項。Property pages allow an ActiveX control user to view and change ActiveX control properties. 藉由叫用控制項屬性對話方塊，其中包含提供自訂的圖形化介面來檢視及編輯控制項屬性的一或多個屬性頁中存取這些屬性。These properties are accessed by invoking a control properties dialog box, which contains one or more property pages that provide a customized, graphical interface for viewing and editing the control properties.
